extension.summary: Project @lpha Update TV Guide Version 1.9.4
extension.description:
Updates the Renegades TV Guide
To disable the auto update feature - Select configure - Change Auto Update to OFF

extension.summary: Install Addons
extension.description: Updates and Addons From Project @lpha
